name: Scroll of Detect Monsters
price: a scryer's ink that glows with lurking eyes.

name: Scroll of Light
description: Radiant rune unfurling beams to banish gloom

name: Scroll of Teleport
price: lands you near or in the maw of doom.

name: Scroll of Word of Recall
price: a prayer's pull through planar threads.

name: Scroll of Phase Door
price: a thief's trick or coward's escape.

name: Scroll of Satisfaction
description: Enchanting writ that sates endless hunger

name: Scroll of Acid
description: Corrosive incantation melting armor and flesh

name: Scroll of Holy Word
price: a paladin's thunder against the night.

name: Scroll of Stinking Cloud
price: chokes lungs and blinds the bold.

name: Scroll of Destroy Area
description: Cataclysmic curse crumbling stone to dust

name: Scroll of Identify
price: dispels the veil of unknown enchantments.

name: Scroll of Holy Weapon
price: turns iron to instrument of gods.
